Data Models (I)
• Path Enumeration Data Model is defined as a 
model that, for each node, it stores the path (as a 
string) from the root to the node.

Adjacency  List is a recursive structure for 
hierarchical representations that comprises a 
list of nodes with a linking column to their 
parent nodes.
